data.quote: The best portion of a good man's life: his little, nameless unremembered acts of kindness and love.
data.author: William Wordsworth, Lyrical Ballads

data.quote: Fill your paper with the breathings of your heart.
data.author: William Wordsworth

data.quote: Nature never did betray, The heart that loved her.
data.author: William Wordsworth

data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: he best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
data.author: Chinese Proverb

data.quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: I wake up every morning and think to myself, ‘how far can I push this company in the next 24 hours.
data.author: Leah Busque
